name: Haleshi
description: The Haleshi is a large, fey creature with a strong physical presence, characterized by high charisma and unique charm abilities.
memorable: The ability to incapacitate foes with its Stupefying Touch and teleport allies with Clamport makes Haleshi a strategic and manipulative presence in battle.
goals: To manipulate and control the battlefield while serving as a formidable opponent or intriguing ally.
relations: Related to other fey creatures, it might serve or be encountered alongside aquatic beings.
environment: Often found in aquatic environments or near bodies of water.
strengths: Possesses high defenses and magical versatility with strong resistances and condition immunities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to physical damage types that are not resisted by its cold damage resistance.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack with Stupefying Touch, dealing psychic damage and potentially incapacitating its target.
most_powerful_ability: Charming Defense ability boosts its AC significantly when unarmored.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 16, enhancing its threat detection.
skills: Shows exceptional skill in insight and persuasion, enabling effective social interaction.
additional_information: Amphibious, allowing breathing in water and air
Innate spellcaster with spells that enhance combat and diplomacy
Can use Water Shield to enhance defenses or negate fire damage
spellcasting: Can cast charm person and invisibility three times daily, with access to major image, water walk, and zone of truth once daily each.
test_queries: fey creature that teleports its allies
